SELECT tpc.team_name as teamName, p.player_name as playerName, tpc.player_no as playerNo FROM team_player_contract as tpc INNER JOIN player as p ON p.player_no = tpc.player_no WHERE tpc.team_name = #{teamName}
SELECT team_name as teamName FROM team WHERE team_name != #{teamName}
